gen:ReportedAttribute.com:Text: 15 Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss.
15.a Mobilize and significantly increase financial resources from all sources to conserve and sustainably use biodiversity and ecosystems
15.a.1 Official development assistance and public expenditure on conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity and ecosystems
Ministry of Finance of the Kyrgyz Republic
Chinara Sharshenovna Kenjebaeva – Head of International Cooperation Department a.i, Ministry of Finance of the Kyrgyz Republic
ch.kenjebaeva@minfin.kg

Official development assistance and public expenditure on conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity and ecosystems is defined as Gross disbursements of total ODA from all donors for biodiversity.
Total ODA flows to developing countries quantify the public effort that donors provide to developing countries for biodiversity.
Administrative
Отчетность по освоению средств, направленных на реализацию проектов государственных инвестиций (ежемесячно), отчетность о ходе реализации проектов государственных инвестиций (ежеквартально)
The sum of ODA flows from all donors to developing countries that have biodiversity as a principal or significant objective.
Statistics are submitted to all donors during the calendar year and may differ from fiscal year data available in budget documents for some countries.
On a recipient basis for all developing countries eligible for ODA. Statistics are submitted on an annual basis.
Applicable
The Kyrgyz Republic SDG National Reporting Platform: https://sustainabledevelopment-kyrgyzstan.github.io http://www/amp.gov.kg http://www.oecd.org/dac/stats/methodology.htm
